io.gsas_file_reader Module¶

This is the module for reading files created in GSAS file formats https://subversion.xor.aps.anl.gov/trac/pyGSAS

skbeam.io.gsas_file_reader.gsas_reader(file)¶
Parameters:
file: str

GSAS powder data file

Returns:
tthndarray

twotheta values (degrees) shape (N, ) array

intensityndarray

intensity values shape (N, ) array

errndarray

error value of intensity shape(N, ) array
